name: Caribbean Diaspora in Canada
description: Explores the transnational circuits through which the Caribbean diaspora makes a living and makes life in contemporary Canada.  How do we make sense of the Caribbean experience in Canada?  What might an engagement with the Caribbean teach us about Canada as a diasporic space?
exclusions: NEW329H1 (if taken in Summer 2013 or Summer 2014 as "The Caribbean Diaspora: Travels and Tribulations")
